name: claudish-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Claudish - Run Claude Code with any model

scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run build:cli && bun run build:bridge
scripts.typecheck: bun --cwd packages/core run typecheck && bun --cwd packages/cli run typecheck && bun --cwd packages/macos-bridge run typecheck
scripts.lint: bun --cwd packages/core run lint && bun --cwd packages/cli run lint && bun --cwd packages/macos-bridge run lint
scripts.format: bun --cwd packages/core run format && bun --cwd packages/cli run format && bun --cwd packages/macos-bridge run format
scripts.test: bun --cwd packages/core run test && bun --cwd packages/cli run test && bun --cwd packages/macos-bridge run test

author: Jack Rudenko <i@madappgang.com>
